website_summaries.verdict: Natural product aimed at plumping up thinning and fine hair.
pros: Uses maltodextrin, derived from sugar, to coat the hair and visibly make it thicker
Does a good job of adding volume
Makes hair super smooth and silky
cons: Hair can take on displeasing, "chunky" texture

product_meta.title: Briogeo Blossom & Bloom Ginseng Conditioner, 8 oz
feature_bullets: ENHANCE THE LOOK OF HAIR FULLNESS AND THICKNESS: Briogeo’s Blossom & Bloom Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Conditioner contains natural ingredients that enhance the look of hair fullness and thickness for those with thin, limp or fine hair. This remarkable conditioner is infused with follicle stimulating ingredients that support the hair from root to tip and promote fullness of the hair. Natural clarifying agents, lemon and witch hazel, absorb excess oil and extend time between blowouts.

FORMULATED WITH NATURAL PERFORMANCE INGREDIENTS: Our volumizing conditioner contains a unique ingredient - maltodextrin, a natural sugar starch - to coat each strand to promote a fuller appearance without sticky or stiff after-effects. For long term benefits, this volumizing conditioner contains ginger and ginseng to support natural blood flow to the scalp and support follicle health, while biotin supports the hair shaft..

ADDITIVE AND CRUELTY-FREE: Briogeo is proud to say that Blossom & Bloom Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Conditioner is 98% naturally derived. Specially formulated, this volumizing conditioner for thin, fine hair does not include sulfates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, DEA, or artificial dyes. It’s certified gluten-free and cruelty-free so you can feel good about looking good! To achieve ultimate volume and fullness, use with our Blossom & Bloom Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Shampoo.

PERFECT FOR TREATED HAIR: The incredible ingredients in this volumizing conditioner make it the ideal product for nourishing and maintaining treated hair. Whether you routinely color your hair or use a keratin or chemical treatment, the unique blend of vitamins and nutrients will help keep your hair looking and feeling its best!

ABOUT BRIOGEO: Beautiful hair shouldn’t be compromised by harsh or harmful ingredients. Briogeo offers a high-performance hair care collection that is naturally based, yet performance driven to provide visible results. All Briogeo formulas live up to their performance claims – providing the vibrant, beautiful and healthy hair we constantly strive to achieve.
